name: Labyrinth Prototype
description:
This is a test for making a game in Smile Game Builder for #mspaintjam2k17.

Current game features:

  • Really hard 3D mazes to walk around in
  • Different layouts and art for each floor (usually)
  • Entering a door takes you to a random dungeon floor
  • No combat, interaction, or anything besides wandering

Please try it if you have the time and let me know if it doesn't work on your computer or you can walk through walls, and what sort of gameplay you'd like to see!
